word: "We feel very grateful to our heavenly Father," declared Mrs. White during the 1905 Conference session where the fund was made up, "because He has moved by His Holy Spirit upon the minds of His people to give so liberally for the establishment of His work here in Washington. . . . He will place His approval on the efforts made to carry forward His work on the lines that He has marked out." [IDEM, JUNE 1, 1905, P. 13.]
